front.title: MUPPET: Internet Media Guide Unidirectional Point-to-Multipoint Transport

abstract.t: This document defines MUPPET, a unidirectional point-to-multipointtransport protocol for the delivery of Internet Media Guide metadata.The MUPPET protocol is based on Asynchronous Layered Coding, amassively scalable protocol for reliable multicast transport. MUPPETis intended to be used with the Internet Media Guide framework, andin addition may be useful with other applications.
